title: The problem with post-pandemic work
description:
A special repost from the folks at Vox Quick Hits! While the Recode Daily team is out enjoying some vacation, Tell Me More host Emily Stewart and Vox senior correspondent Anna North are here to explore the ways the pandemic changed the way we work, and whether we can — and should — go back. 

This episode originally aired June 8, 2021 on Vox Quick Hits. 

Learn more: 
Read Anna’s story on bosses moving past the pandemic: https://www.vox.com/22455058/jobs-restaurants-office-employers-covid-pandemic-workv

Find Emily’s story on states cutting off unemployment insurance early here: https://www.vox.com/policy-and-politics/2021/6/3/22465160/states-ending-unemployment-labor-shortage-texas

Tell Me More is a Vox Quick Hits podcast hosted by Emily Stewart and produced by Sofi LaLonde.
